description: Reference® 2 Single-Channel Adjustable Pipette, 20-200 µL, Eppendorf is an improved volume-adjustable pipette with extraordinary precision and accuracy, a long service lifes and an ergonomic design. The new Reference 2 is an ideal instrument for liquid handling due to its properties of that innovative single button, sturdy handle manufactured with stainless steel, 4-digit volume display with magnifying window, secondary adjustment, etc. Besides improved ergonomics the design focus lays on providing the most accurate results possible, optimum user safety, reliability and robustness for a long service life. The innovative single button operation is not only fast and simple, but also can effectively reduce aerosols, thus protecting users, samples and pipettes.
name: Reference 2 Single-Channel Adjustable Pipette
